docs.snippet: Britain's upper house of parliament defeated Prime Minister Theresa May's government on Wednesday, voting in favor of a change to her Brexit plan that says she can only trigger exit talks if she promises to protect the rights of EU citizens....
docs.lead_paragraph: Britain's upper house of parliament defeated Prime Minister Theresa May's government on Wednesday, voting in favor of a change to her Brexit plan that says she can only trigger exit talks if she promises to protect the rights of EU citizens.

headline.main: UK PM May's Brexit Plan Suffers Setback in Parliament
headline.print_headline: UK PM May's Brexit Plan Suffers Setback in Parliament

docs.snippet: Facebook Inc's virtual reality unit Oculus has cut $200 from the total price of its flagship hardware set, in a bid to expand the system's base of video game players, the company said on Wednesday....

docs.snippet: The German parliament, which was attacked by hackers in 2015, suffered an internet outage for several hours on Wednesday but there were no indications it was triggered by a cyber attack, a spokesman for the Bundestag said....
docs.lead_paragraph: The German parliament, which was attacked by hackers in 2015, suffered an internet outage for several hours on Wednesday but there were no indications it was triggered by a cyber attack, a spokesman for the Bundestag said.

headline.main: German Parliament Suffers Internet Outage but No Signs of Attack
headline.print_headline: German Parliament Suffers Internet Outage but No Signs of Attack
